About Company

At AZoom Car Rentals, we believe that everyone should have access to affordable and convenient transportation. That's why we offer a wide range of vehicles at competitive prices, making it easy for you to find the perfect drive for your needs. We understand that when you're on the road, you need a car that's reliable and comfortable. That's why we maintain our fleet to the highest standards, ensuring that every vehicle is in top condition before you hit the road. And with a variety of sizes and styles to choose from, you can always find the right fit for your trip.

Our Strengths

Wide Range of Vehicles

We offer a variety of vehicles to choose from, including compact cars, SUVs, minivans, and more. This makes it easy to find the perfect drive for your needs, whether you're traveling alone or with a group.

Competitive Prices

We believe that everyone should have access to affordable transportation, which is why we offer our vehicles at competitive prices. With AZoom Car Rental, you can enjoy a comfortable and reliable drive without breaking the bank.

Our Reviews

Best Price Quoted

Went to change my tyres with AZoom Car Rentals after checking out prices from a few shops. Azoom Car Rentals quoted the lowest and installation was fuss-free and professional.

Fuss free tyre change

Changed 4 pcs 195/50/15 Kumho PS31 here @ $70/pc (made in Vietnam). Did some research and this price was good enough for me.

Kumho PS31 205/55/16  

I was looking around the web and saw that they are selling Kumho PS31 205/55/16 @ $85. Initially thought that it was some marketing gimmicks as usual.

Tyre Change @AZoom Car Rentals  

Have great first visit experience. They actually prepared the tyres in advanced after communicating via SMS. The equipment is new and highly automated. Payment can be made via NETS and CASH. Give them a try next time you need to replace tyres!

Thumbs up!

The staff appeared busy whenever I drove into their workshop. However, they still took the effort and time to showed me 3 different types of tyres that are suitable for me. They also explained to me the benefits of each individual ones. Not pushy or hard selling. Good service!

Great Price & Service

I was strongly recommended by a friend to approach AZoom Car Rentals if I ever need to replace tyre. Drove over and informed them on my tyre size. I was advised on a few brands with detailed comparison among them. Selected a set based on my driving pattern and installation was done within 30 mins. Friendly and approachable staff!

Great Deals

Good selection of tyre choices available at reasonable prices. Swift and fast installation process too. Strongly recommend AZoom Car Rentals to anyone who wants to replace tyres.

Best Price, Great Service

Changed my tyres with AZoom Car Rentals after receiving few quotations from different workshops. Great installation job done as the installer is very careful to ensure precise fitting. Great job.
